title: Collaborative Learning Design for Pre-Service Teachers Using Knowledge-Building Communities and Multivoiced Educational Frameworks

context.prior_knowledge: Basic pedagogical theory and digital tool utilization experience
context.additional_context: Pre-service teachers collaboratively construct knowledge to design human-centered future learning spaces and experience educational environments reflecting diverse voices.

learning_goals: Learners can perform collaborative problem-solving activities three or more times following Knowledge-Building Community (KBC) principles in VR simulations.
Learners can design inclusive learning scenarios by applying the four elements (space, technology, pedagogy, content) of the Polycontextual Education (PE) framework.
Learners can develop assessment rubrics that promote learner-led self-expression and creative knowledge-sharing activities using digital tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
